adHeader: EFFICIENT HOUSE CLEANING*GOOD PRICES*CALL US NOW
adDetails: PROFESIONAL HOUSE CLEANING CONTACT US TO show contact info Bathrooms : Scrub out sinks, toilets and showers/tubs Clean all surfaces with a disinfectant Shine all mirrors and counter tops surfaces Thoroughly clean floors. Kitchen : Scrub out kitchen sink with appropriate cleaner Clean and shine all kitchen counters Wipe down the outside of all appliances Remove burners on top of stove and clean with degreaser inside microwave. Thoroughly clean all floors Bedrooms: Make beds if customer leaves clean linens on edge of bed Pick up and straighten items in bedroom, on chests, tables, nightstands Dust all surfaces in bedroom Shine all mirrors or glass surfaces Oil any wood surfaces such as bed frames or furniture Clean entire floor area with vacuum if carpeted or clean with wood floor/tile care Living Areas : Straighten all areas such as magazines, items on desks and tables Dust entire surfaces in living areas Clean and shine all surfaces such as mirrors or glass tables Oil all wood furniture Wipe down ceiling fans as needed Clean entire floor areas with vacuum if carpeted or clean with wood floor/tile care. Also emptying of all trash in the entire house. windows included inside only
